com.epoch.utils

Class MathMethods

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.epoch.utils.MathMethods
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    MathUtils

    public class MathMethods
extends Object
    Holds math utility functions.

        public static int getMod(int num,

        Parameters:
        num - a positive or negative integer
        mod - the modulus
        Returns:
